```
1 Q. Okay. Well, in the next sentence, you
2 indicate, quote -- and I'll just read it to
3 you. Quote: "He felt confident the deal to
4 buy them, Card Connect, would get done. He
5 told me to keep this between you and I as he
6 doesn't know," quote, unquote, "for sure," end
7 quote; correct?
8 A. Correct.
9 Q. That conversation you had, in which
10 someone very, very senior I know at Blackstone,
11 close quote, felt confident the deal would get
12 done, did that happen before or after you had
13 heard from Chris that the deal had been signed?
14 A. I don't believe -- I don't know.
15 Q. You don't know?
16 A. I don't know.
```

```
23 Q. Okay. And without telling me the person's
24 name, how senior a person in Blackstone was
25 this very, very senior person you were speaking
  1 with?
2 A. Pretty senior.
3 Q. Pretty senior?
4 A. (Nods head.)
5 Q. Are we talking about one of the top five
6 people at Blackstone?
7 A. Yes.
```

P⁠‎&#8206;⁠&#x200B;⁠‌&#x200B;&#8203;&#x200B;&#8206;‍&#8206;&#8206;‍‌&#8204;&#8288;‌‌﻿&#8204;⁠g﻿‌&#8204;‌&#8203;﻿&#8203;​&#8288;⁠&#8203;&#x200B;&#8205;⁠‌‍⁠&#8288;&#8204;&#8204;&#8206;&#8206;‎&#8288;&#8288;﻿&#8204; 8&#8288;﻿&#8288;&#8206;﻿‌&#8205;‎‎&#x200B;&#8288;&#8288;&#8205;&#8205;&#8204;​​&#8204;‍&#x200B;‍⁠&#x200B;‎&#x200B;&#x200B;&#x200B;&#8206;⁠‎&#8288;&#8288;&#8206;​&#8203;﻿﻿&#8206;&#8205;&#8206;&#8204;⁠&#8203;&#x200B;﻿&#8206;&#8204;​3﻿‌‍​‍&#8203;‍‌‌⁠​&#8204;‌&#x200B;﻿⁠⁠&#8204;&#8205;&#x200B;&#8206;﻿﻿&#8205;&#x200B;﻿⁠⁠&#8288;⁠
```
6 THE WITNESS: Let me reiterate,
7 counsel. My son did not at any time discuss
8 anything with me involving Card Connect,
9 Blackstone. My brother didn't. And I would
10 never -- I want to protect my source, but I did
11 have someone that I spoke to once in a while, a
12 very senior person. So I don't want to
13 disclose any information which could be
14 misconstrued.
```
